name: 2D and 3D Godot: Game 02
description:
This is the second game in 2D and 3D Godot development project.  A game is 2D turn-based adventure with 2D platformer elements.  The project is playable, but there is a work in progress on many game elements like story, content, and playability.

Use a mouse or keyboard to play!

W , up arrow - move up S , down arrow - move down D , right arrow - move right A , left arrow - move left Space - jump ESC - main menu

Game setup under a minute, be patient.

See the previous  game from the project: game 01

Enjoy a game!
